about_the_game:
TOD Fragments: Special Fun


The events of this game revolve around the main character of the Naitras: Threads of Destiny game and his acquaintance with a mysterious lady from a brothel.

Game features:

  • You will get acquainted with one of the storylines of the game Threads of Destiny;
  • 8 fully animated scenes with a lot of action variations;
  • Game text: 80,000+ characters;

These Fragments were previously released on RPGMakerMV, and have recently been transferred to Unity.

In Fragments, you can see examples of our work on Threads of Destiny, which includes individual character stories, animations, art, and other content that was not included in the main game when it was developed on RPGMaker MV.







If you have already played TOD Fragments: Special Fun(RPGMaker MV) before, you will find hardly anything new in this version, except for optimization and various improvements.

Some time ago we started developing a fantasy game called the Naitras: Threads of Destiny as a visualization of one story that takes place somewhere on the edge of the Universe.

Naitras: Threads of Destiny is currently being reworked on Unity, you can find more about it on our website.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work. It has nudity and scenes of a sexual nature, adult content, and adult-only sexual content. All characters depicted are over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2,0 ГГц Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2,0 ГГц Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, NVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
